column4: hi, I have a problem, my computer freezes when it wakes up from hibernate
can anybody help
what kind of computer are you using?
what specs?
what version of ubuntu
laptop, tx2500, ubuntu 9.04, with compiz and fglrx
do sudo apt-get update then sudo apt-get upgrade
well its updating flash plugin
hmmm, im not sure what the problem could be, how long do you give it to wake up?
well alot!
haha, hmmm, ive never ran into this, unless your computer just cant handle hibernate
its does!
its a new HP tx2500
did it come with Ubuntu? or Windows?
windows
its a tablet pc
tablet? as in touch?
ahhhh, now that i dont know, i dont know what the differences are on those
i noticed that the hibernation started not working after I enabled fglrx
well you can try disabling that, then put it in hibernate, then see if it happens again
if that is the problem contact HP or the creator of fglrx and let them know
its the ati driver
then yea, that might be the problem, more than likely is
